facebook/docusaurus.summary: The facebook/docusaurus repository has seen significant activity recently. There have been multiple pull requests, including one that refactors the core to use the Intl native API for locale direction and removes the rtl-detect dependency. Additionally, there have been push events to deploy updates and bump the nanoid dependency from 3.3.7 to 3.3.8, addressing a vulnerability and improving overall performance.
